overview: Greg is a 27 year veteran of IT. During his career he has held virtually every position from programmer through Chief Software Architect. He is extremely customer focused and results oriented. While at the St. Petersburg Times â€“ one of the top 10 Newspapers in the US, he worked on all financial, operational, and advertising systems designing and implementing powerful and scalable client-server architectures as well as a comprehensive Executive Information System. At Catalina Marketing he specialized in projects designing optimized data structures, algorithms and platforms to help manage and process multi hundred billion record datasets at extraordinary high speeds, and constant optimization of existing processes, often achieving orders of magnitude in performance gains. Greg has a B.A. in Business Administration from the University of South Florida.
